emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Autonomous Urban Planning
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously planning and optimizing urban layouts for efficiency, sustainability, and human well-being.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for equitable resource distribution, improved quality of life, but also raises concerns about privacy and surveillance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires advanced AI algorithms, urban governance integration, and public acceptance of AI in civic planning.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Neural Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Neural interfaces that leverage quantum computing to enhance brain-computer interaction, potentially allowing for mind uploading or advanced cognitive tools.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ethical debates over consciousness, privacy, and the nature of human identity; potential for profound medical breakthroughs.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological feasibility, regulatory approval, and overcoming public skepticism regarding brain-computer integration.

emerging_technologies.name: Interplanetary Resource Extraction
emerging_technologies.description: Robotic systems for mining and processing resources on extraterrestrial bodies like the Moon or Mars.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Economic shifts, potential for resource conflicts, and new markets; addresses Earth's resource depletion.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological advancements in robotics, AI, and space transportation; international space law and agreements.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Energy Grids
emerging_technologies.description: Blockchain-enabled energy grids allowing for peer-to-peer energy trading and local energy management.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Promotes energy independence, reduces dependency on large utilities, but requires regulatory changes.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Legislation, technological integration, and consumer education on energy management.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Code Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI tools like Cursor AI that significantly boost developer productivity through intelligent code completion, error correction, and natural language commands.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread use in software development, with companies adopting AI assistants for faster coding and fewer errors.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Delivery Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Vehicles capable of self-navigating to deliver goods, reducing human labor and increasing efficiency.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Integrated into logistics chains for last-mile delivery, with regulatory frameworks adapting to support this technology.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on creating environmentally sustainable cities through technology integration.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improves quality of life, reduces environmental impact, but requires significant investment and policy changes.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increasing urban populations, climate change mitigation, and smart city initiatives.

epoch_themes.description: Advancements in space technology to support long-term human presence off-world.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for new industries, economic shifts, and international cooperation or competition.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Rising interest in space exploration, commercialization of space, and the need for new resources.
